item.title: Help with command! Trying to make new command!
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

Hi everyone i am trying to make a command for moparscape that when you type ::levelup (level) (playername) it changes the rights of that player to the level you say wat i put was two mods together and it i came up with else if (command.startsWith("levelup") && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mjstar"))) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(9); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; int newRights = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8)); if (newRights >= 0 && newRights < 4) { p.playerrights = newRights; p.sendMessage("You have been modded thanks to "+playerName); { else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } { catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name that you want to mod..."); } }
But for some reason when i compile it dont work please help and post a working one!!

Read full topic
item.source: Help with command! Trying to make new command!
